sense.def:
A variation on something
je ista stvar, predstavljena v drugačni obliki.

seg.quote: ...the same programme with only nightly variations.
His books are all variations on a basic theme.

sense.def:
A variation
je tudi sprememba stopnje, količine ali števila.

seg.quote: The Boards have learned how to cope with a large variation in demand for electricity.
Plants were observed for variation in flowering dates.
